title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list is not persisted between sessions in the workbench.
OB: When starting the workbench, the MRU file list is empty.
EB: The MRU file list should be preserved between sessions and display the previously opened files.
SR:
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench.
5. Check if the previously opened files are displayed in the MRU file list.
